== General ==
The Team Reports App is project that is trying to replace TeamReports and make it easier to get involved. The code can be found at '''http://launchpad.net/ubuntu-teamreports'''

== Features ==

* Automatically import teams from `~ubuntu-council-teams` ((./)) and `~locoteams`
* Proposing new teams to be added (./)
** teams that are not in of the team reports app yet can be proposed manually and have to be accepted by app admins
* Login via Launchpad OpenID (./)
* Admin interface for  (./)
** accepting new teams,
** assigning team categories (technical team, governance board, loco team, etc.) and 
** ordering teams in the resulting team reports
* multiple views on team reports
** by team category, 
** by month, 
** by year, etc.)
* editing
** login, (./)
** check access control (different options)
** member of the team(?)
** owner/admin of the team
** assigned as responsible for the team reports
** (more? free for all?)
** you can easily add new team report notes 
** per wysiwyg editor
